metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8035 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The image view functionality in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 5.2.22 is affected by a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability via an SVG image upload containing a JavaScript payload. An attacker can obtain access to a victim's webmail account by making them visit a malicious URL.

criterions.comment: php-horde: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
